bibl.title: That Herodean Diptych Again.
bibl.note: Mimiamb VII is in subject as well as in identity of characters the sequel to Mimiamb VI. The leather 'baubons' which Kerdon makes with consummate skill (VI, 68-73) and purveys in secret (VI, 63) are also an underlying topic of VII.
bibl.seg: RIST Anna, That Herodean Diptych Again.

Mimiamb VII is in subject as well as in identity of characters the sequel to Mimiamb VI. The leather 'baubons' which Kerdon makes with consummate skill (VI, 68-73) and purveys in secret (VI, 63) are also an underlying topic of VII.
